title: SQL
description:
SQL Tutorial | Learn SQL Programming
Last Updated: 22 May, 2024
This Programming Language SQL Tutorial is very well suited for beginners and also for experienced programmers. This specially designed free SQL tutorial will help you learn SQL programming most efficiently, with all topics from basics to advanced (like Joins, Subqueries, Indexing, etc.) with examples.

What is SQL?
SQL (Structured Query Language) is a high-level, domain-specific, and widely-used programming language for managing and manipulating databases. SQL programming language is being used in database management, data analysis, and backend development, along with all cutting-edge technology in Software Industry. SQL is being used by almost all tech-giant companies like – Google, Amazon, Facebook, Instagram, Netflix, Uber… etc.

What is C++?
C++ is a high-level, general-purpose, and powerful programming language. C++ programming language (latest C++20) is being used in system/software development, game development, and real-time simulations, along with all cutting-edge technology in Software Industry. C++ language is being used by almost all tech-giant companies like – Google, Amazon, Facebook, Instagram, Adobe, Uber… etc.

CSS language (latest CSS3) is being used in web development, frontend development, and responsive design, along with all cutting-edge technology in Software Industry. Swift programming language (latest Swift 5.8) is being used in iOS and macOS development, along with all cutting-edge technology in Software Industry. Swift language is being used by almost all tech-giant companies like – Apple, Google, Amazon, Facebook, Instagram, Uber… etc.
